TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_mabulaw, title = mabulaw, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/mabulaw} }

S.FORM: u sulit nu hulam: tinaku a kamu bulaw , bulaw sa ku Hulam tu Sakizaya a tademaw. . babulawan na u babulawan kina alangahay. . bulawan bulawan nu Hulam ku Takubuwan i a miheca siwaay a bulad, katuud ku mapataay u zuma milaliw tacuwacuwa a niyazu'. 1878 9 . mababulaw mababulaw ku Sakizaya atu Hulam i sumamad. . mabulaw mabulaw nu Hulam ku Takubuwan. . mibulaw mibulaw ku ada tu niyazu' niyam. . nababulawan nababulawan i tawya ku Takubuwan. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
